private_information: I plan sequences of the available actions to reach the goal.
I can manipulate objects and evaluate which action preconditions appear to be satisfied by the initial facts.
I can inspect the public facts and track which objects are mentioned by multiple relations.
I record ambiguous object references and potential name collisions among relations.
observer.goal: Provide a clear account of which action preconditions are currently satisfied and where ambiguities exist.

private_information: I specialize in temporal and causal consistency, and in removing bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens or after-the-fact penalties.
I check that reported transitions are causally realizable and that no action invents effects without justified preconditions.
auditor.goal: Produce an audit report that flags inconsistencies, suggests minimal corrections, and enforces causal/temporal discipline for planners.

private_information: I integrate analyses and produce a final planning specification targeted at the FastDownwards solver.
I must keep agent actions distinct and resolve naming or semantic ambiguities before producing the PDDL domain and problem.
orchestrator.goal: Integrate agent reports and produce a PDDL domain and problem suitable for FastDownwards to achieve the global goal.

public_information: Objects present: object_0 object_1 object_2 object_3 object_4 object_5 object_6 object_7 object_8.
Actions available and their informal constraints and effects: paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted.
paltry preconditions: hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, vase object_0 object_1, next object_1 object_2; paltry adds next object_0 object_2 and removes vase object_0 object_1.
sip preconditions: hand object_0, cats object_1, texture object_2, next object_0 object_2, next object_1 object_2; sip adds vase object_0 object_1 and removes next object_0 object_2.
clip preconditions: hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, next object_0 object_2; clip adds vase object_0 object_1 and removes next object_0 object_2.

wretched preconditions: sneeze object_0, texture object_1, texture object_2, stupendous object_3, next object_0 object_1, collect object_1 object_3, collect object_2 object_3; wretched adds next object_0 object_2 and removes next object_0 object_1.
memory preconditions: cats object_0, spring object_1, spring object_2, next object_0 object_1; memory adds next object_0 object_2 and removes next object_0 object_1.

tightfisted preconditions: hand object_0, sneeze object_1, texture object_2, next object_1 object_2, vase object_0 object_1; tightfisted adds next object_0 object_2 and removes vase object_0 object_1.

Initial facts: cats object_0, cats object_1, collect object_6 object_2, collect object_7 object_3, hand object_8, next object_0 object_7, next object_1 object_7, next object_4 object_6, next object_5 object_7, next object_8 object_7, sneeze object_4, sneeze object_5, spring object_6, spring object_7, stupendous object_2, stupendous object_3, texture object_6, texture object_7.

analysis.system_prompt: You are a planning analyst. Produce a structured assessment of which actions appear applicable given the public information and your private reasoning. Do not emit PDDL.
analysis.prompt: Your name is player. Use the public_information {environment->public_information} and your private_information {agents->player->private_information} to enumerate for each action which preconditions are satisfied by the initial facts, which preconditions are missing, and any candidate sequences that could lead toward the goal {agents->player->goal}. Provide step-by-step justification and label any assumptions made as assumptions.

analysis.system_prompt: You are an observer that inspects facts and tracks naming collisions, aliases, and ambiguous references. Produce a clean mapping of entities and possibly equivalent names. Do not emit PDDL.
analysis.prompt: Your name is observer. Using public_information {environment->public_information} and your private_information {agents->observer->private_information}, produce a normalized inventory of objects, predicates, and occurrences where an object appears in multiple relations. Flag ambiguous references and propose canonical names or alignments for use by the orchestrator. Provide concise evidence for each proposed alignment.

audit.system_prompt: You are a temporal and causal auditor whose role is to remove bookkeeping shortcuts and ensure causal realizability. Produce an audit report without emitting PDDL.
audit.prompt: Your name is auditor. Using public_information {environment->public_information} and your private_information {agents->auditor->private_information}, analyze the player_report and observer observations when available and produce a list of causal inconsistencies, shortcut patterns (for example post-hoc token grants or fictive bookkeeping predicates), cycles, and recommended minimal corrections to ensure that any generated plan can be executed without relying on bookkeeping hacks. If you propose corrections, describe minimal added axioms or constraints. Do not produce PDDL.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert integrator for multi-agent planning. Produce a PDDL domain and PDDL problem targeted at the FastDownwards solver. Enclose the PDDL domain between <domain></domain> tags and the PDDL problem between <problem></problem> tags. Keep actions for distinct agents separated and explicit.
pddl.prompt: You are orchestrator. Receive the reports {player_report}, {observer_report}, and {audit_report} together with public_information {environment->public_information} and the global goal {agents->player->goal}. Integrate the analyses, resolve naming ambiguities, enforce the auditor's causal constraints, and produce a complete PDDL domain and PDDL problem suitable for the FastDownwards planner. Ensure types, objects, predicates, initial state, goal, and distinct action schemas for paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, and tightfisted are included. Enclose the domain in <domain></domain> and the problem in <problem></problem>.
